metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0998 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An integer overflow flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s virtio device driver code in the way a user triggers the vhost_vdpa_config_validate function. This flaw allows a local user to crash or potentially escalate their privileges on the system.

notes.Note: alexmurray> As per https://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2022/04/02/1 3ed21c1451a14d139e1ceb18f2fa70865ce3195a is also required as well.
